artist: Artist: Frank Lloyd Wright; Publisher: Horizon Press; Author: Foreword by William Wesley Peters, American, 1912-1991; Author: Introduction by Frank Lloyd Wright
creditline: The Modernism Collection, gift of Norwest Bank Minnesota
description: portfolio comprised of 100 plates illustrating approx. 70 buildings and projects designed by Wright between 1893-1909

provenance: Norwest Corp., Minneapolis; given to MIA, 1998.
title: Buildings Plans and Designs by Frank Lloyd Wright
